messages.title: A Record of Action - A Promise of More
messages.content: David Chappell and the Lib Dems have a strong record of action in Edmunds. Now they promise more if elected.

messages.title: Lib Dem alternative Plan
messages.content: The Lib Dems propose an alternative plan that includes investments into various sectors such as the NHS, schools, and mental health services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest an extra £35bn in the NHS and mental health services.
Provide £10bn more for schools and 20,000 more teachers.
Take bold action on the climate emergency.
Stop Brexit with a people's vote.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet implies a tactical situation by suggesting that Labour cannot win in this area, advocating for voting Lib Dem to stop the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit with a people's vote.
issues.education: Provide £10bn more for schools and 20,000 more teachers.
issues.environment: Take bold action on the climate emergency.
issues.health: Invest an extra £35bn in the NHS and mental health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born and bred in Edmunds!

politicalExperience.achievements: Focusing on Edmunds delivering real improvements.

contactInformation.address: 5 The Brickfield Centre, Milton Road South, Stowmarket, IP14 1BW

images.caption: The Lib Dem alternative plan infographic

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet shows David Chappell with groups of people, presumably constituents, which may indicate his engagement with the community.
